newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Xionics started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Xionics started as buy.

text.p: -- SoundView Financial said it started coverage of Xionics Document Technologies Inc with short-term and long-term buy ratings.
-- Set FY 1997 earnings estimate at $0.43 per share.
-- Set FY 1998 estimate at $0.55 per share.
